title: Empower Personal Bankers to Be Their Best Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1How does Salesforce help banks prioritize their prospects?

answers.content: B By identifying prospects who perform a combination of activities that predict a purchase

wrongAnswers.content: C By arranging prospects in a report according to who has the most money
D By arranging prospects according to which region has the highest sales targets
A By tracking prospects who visit bank branches most often

correctAnswer.content: B By identifying prospects who perform a combination of activities that predict a purchase

questions.title: 2How can a personal banker use Salesforce to accelerate a prospect's buying journey?

answers.content: B By reaching out to a prospect after an Einstein alert suggests the prospect is likely to abandon the purchase process

wrongAnswers.content: A By automatically enrolling a prospect in text message notifications after Einstein logs a phone call with the prospect
C By sending a text message to a prospect rather than calling when records indicate that's more likely to generate a response

questions.title: 3Which of the following is a benefit of banks partnering with Realtors or insurance agents in an online community?

answers.content: A Banks and partners can evaluate one another's financial performance.
B Banks and partners can easily make referrals and track one another's activities so they jointly address a customer's needs.

wrongAnswers.content: C Partners can unbundle banks' core offerings by providing more services directly to customers.
D Banks and partners can send messages to one another that disappear after they're viewed.

correctAnswer.content: B Banks and partners can easily make referrals and track one another's activities so they jointly address a customer's needs.
